This folder contains the code for the non-negative RESCAL Tensor-Factorization.
================================================================================
Please cite:
============
Denis Krompass, Maximilian Nickel, Xueyan Jiang and Volker Tresp.
Non-Negative Tensor Factorization with RESCAL.
ECML Workshop on Tensor Methods for Machine Learning, 2013.

Bibtex:
@inproceedings{KrompassECML2013,
  author    = {Denis Krompa\ss and Maximilian Nickel and Xueyan Jiang and Volker Tresp},
  title     = {Non-Negative Tensor Factorization with RESCAL},
  booktitle = {ECML Workshop on Tensor Methods for Machine Learning},
  year      = {2013}
}
================================================================================

python packages required:
-------------------------
numpy 
scipy
sklearn

We compile numpy with OpenBlas:
https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS
